name: df-qtop
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cqtop, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, crab(s2, cpw(cima(cv(s1), cuni(cv(s0)))), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(cv(s1)), cv(s2)), cuni(cv(s0))), cv(s0)))))
comment: Define the quotient topology given a function ` f ` and topology ` j ` on the domain of ` f ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Mar-2015.)
